Purple bear



This large balloon was held aloft by a sled kite much farther up.
Taken Sunday, February 08, 2004, 03:11:42pm.  Original image size: 3072x2048, 6.1Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/400s @ F8.0, ISO 100, 70-200mm/F2.8+1.4x @ 215mm (344mm equiv)
